p: Quantitative measurement of the levels of cytokines was performed using Mini Enzyme-Linked Immunosorbent Assay (ELISA) Development Kits (Peprotech). A total of 96-well plates were set up according to the manufacturer's instructions and read using an ELISA plate reader at 405 nm with 650 nm as the correction wavelength. Concentrations of the NRF2, TNF-α and IL-1β were estimated [ 13].
